title: Stage Lv6-P1-S02
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I had been working on the project for three months when the budget was cut.
She had been studying Korean for two years before she moved to Seoul.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 예산이 삭감되었을 때 나는 그 프로젝트를 3개월 동안 진행하고 있었다.
sentences.en: I had been working on the project for three months when the budget was cut.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 서울로 이주하기 전에 2년 동안 한국어를 공부해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: She had been studying Korean for two years before she moved to Seoul.

sentences.kr: 회사는 제품을 출시하기 전에 수년간 개발해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: The company had been developing the product for several years before launching it.

sentences.kr: 그들은 새로운 정책이 발표되기 전까지 오랫동안 협상해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: They had been negotiating for a long time before the new policy was announced.

sentences.kr: 팀은 최종 결정이 내려지기 전까지 몇 주 동안 계획을 수정해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: The team had been revising the plan for several weeks before the final decision was made.

sentences.kr: CEO는 사임 발표 전까지 1년 동안 회사 매각을 고려해오고 있지 않았다.
sentences.en: The CEO had not been considering selling the company for a year before announcing his resignation.

sentences.kr: 연구진은 획기적인 발견을 하기 전까지 10년 동안 실험을 계속해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: The researchers had been conducting experiments for ten years before making the breakthrough discovery.

sentences.kr: 시장이 붕괴되기 전까지 투자자들이 6개월 동안 경고 신호를 무시해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: Investors had been ignoring warning signs for six months before the market collapsed.
